1142.quoteText: We also allow specific partners to collect information from your browser or device for advertising and measurement purposes using their own cookies or similar technologies.
1142.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

tosdr.case: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.
tosdr.tldr: Quote that was there seems to be from the Google privacy policy; updated to the quote that is found in the docs of this service.

1386.title: Blogspot may collect your device fingerprint.

tosdr.tldr: "We collect device-specific information (such as your hardware model, operating system version, unique device identifiers, and mobile network information including phone number). Google may associate your device identifiers or phone number with your Google Account."
